data.name: Lawgivers Demo
data.detailed_description:
With over 30.000 copies sold on mobile platforms, Lawgivers has been now finally adapted to desktop screens.

Lawgivers

Lawgivers is a turn-based political simulator. Take control of a party and run for elections. Tell voters what they want to hear and choose whether to accomplish your promises or not. Once inside parliament approve important laws and shape your country’s destiny.


◉ Choose a party, promise actions to citizens and run for elections
◉ Approve or abolish laws within parliamentary votes
◉ Take care of lawmaker's experience, popularity and loyalty
◉ Corrupt concurrent politicians in order to win majority
◉ Build up relations with other parties and appoint the president

Features:


★ 3 playable nations: Germany, France and Italy
★ Over 80 ordinary and constitutional laws
★ 32 science advances

data.short_description: Lawgivers is a turn-based political simulation game. Run for elections with your own party and enter parliament to approve or abolish laws. Appoint the president and decide whether you want a democracy or just a fake one instead.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
